sources.title: The Seventh Day | Full Movie | Mystery Horror | Guy Pearce
sources.description:
A renowned exorcist teams up with a rookie exorcist for his first day of training. As they plunge deeper into hell on earth, the lines between good and evil blur, and their own demons emerge.
2021.  Stars: Guy Pearce, Vadhir Derbez, Stephen Lang
*Licensed from Voltage Pictures. All rights reserved*
